page.title: 18MEALS
page.content: For breakfast most people have cereal, toast and a drink. Some people have a cooked breakfast which consists of bacon, egg, fried bread and fried tomatoes. The next meal that most people have is their dinner, they eat this at about midday. Quite a lot of people have a cooked meal at this time six days a week. This would probably consist of some kind of cooked meat such as beef, lamb or pork served with two vegetables and gravy. In the summer meat with salad including lettuce, tomatoes and cucumber is often eaten. The meal could finish with a pudding or cheese and biscuits. The third meal of the day is tea at about 5 o'clock. Often this is a snack of cheese or egg on toast or just bread, butter and jam and cakes. At weekends eating habits change according to peoples activities.
